overview: Am I him or am I not? Did I know her or did she know me? I'm not certain who they are yet I feel I have always known them and I canâ€™t help but wonder what became of them. A figure appears then dissolves as the film becomes a memory map. An other figure then appears and merges into the topography of the aged film before once again the first figure briefly reappears.
title: Recollection - Premonition
